# rhcs_log_forwarders (Data Source)

List of log forwarders for a cluster.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster` (String) Identifier of the cluster.

### Read-Only

- `items` (Attributes List) List of log forwarders. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items))

<a id="nestedatt--items"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items`

Read-Only:

- `applications` (List of String) List of additional applications to forward logs for.
- `cloudwatch` (Attributes) CloudWatch configuration for log forwarding destination. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items--cloudwatch))
- `cluster_id` (String) Identifier of the cluster.
- `groups` (Attributes List) List of log forwarder groups. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items--groups))
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the log forwarder.
- `s3` (Attributes) S3 configuration for log forwarding destination. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items--s3))

<a id="nestedatt--items--cloudwatch"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items.cloudwatch`

Read-Only:

- `log_distribution_role_arn` (String) The ARN of the IAM role for log distribution.
- `log_group_name` (String) The name of the CloudWatch log group.


<a id="nestedatt--items--groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items.groups`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) The identifier of the log forwarder group.
- `version` (String) The version of the log forwarder group.


<a id="nestedatt--items--s3"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items.s3`

Read-Only:

- `bucket_name` (String) The name of the S3 bucket.
- `bucket_prefix` (String) The prefix to use for objects stored in the S3 bucket.
